page.title: 09Police Station,Village Hall.
page.content: In 30 years service the policeman has arrested about 150 people for criminal offences.Each day he begins by making Telephone calls between about 8am and 9am. He also deals with people calling At 9:30am he starts his patrol of the Steeple Bumpstead beat and answering radio messages and accidents.He lives in a police house with a special office and he has a police car.He has been on the same village beat longer than any other policeman in this part of Essex. {The Village Hall}is used for a variety of functions.Ballet classes are held there, the Steeple Bumpstead Players perform plays and pantomimes there, the playgroup is held there. Badminton is also played in this hall.Dances and discos are held, and sometimes dry ice skating takes place in the hall.
